total_revenue.context: Q2 2025 revenue of $47.5B with double-digit expansion across ads, Family apps, and emerging services.

costs_and_expenses.context: Managed expenses up modestly thanks to lower G&A, while infrastructure and compensation drove R&D/COGS increases.

operating_income.context: Operating margin expanded to 43% as AI-powered ads performance offset rising infrastructure costs.

net_income.context: Net income benefited from strong topline momentum, higher leverage, and an 11% tax rate.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow of $25.6B with strong conversion from ads and AI services.

free_cash_flow.context: FCF reflected $17B CapEx and $15.1B in non-marketable equity investments.

capital_expenditures.context: CapEx up as Meta builds mega data centers (Prometheus/Hyperion/Titan) and adds AI hardware; FY guide $66-72B.

other_revenue.context: WhatsApp paid messaging and Meta Verified subscriptions grew 50%.

revenue.context: Robust AI glasses growth offset weaker Quest sales.

expenses.context: Higher non-headcount tech spend kept RL operating loss near $4.5B.

initiatives: GEM ranking model scaled on thousands of GPUs
Advantage+ campaign flow now globally streamlined
Omnichannel ads + incremental attribution rolled out worldwide
goals: Drive precision ad supply to objectives
Enable small advertisers with generative creative

milestones: Meta AI exceeds 1B MAUs across 200+ countries
LLM-powered Threads recommendations and content discovery
goals: Make personalization via memory and context more adaptive
Use Meta AI to power business messaging agents
Expand AI devices and glasses form factors

infrastructure.description: CapEx range now $66-72B to finish multi-gigawatt clusters and support gen AI training while maintaining core ranking compute.

q3_2025_revenue_guidance.context: Assumes ~1% FX tailwind, slower Q4 growth expected versus Q3 comps.

full_year_2025_expenses.context: Narrowed range anticipating 20-24% YoY growth with infrastructure and comp headwinds.

capex.context: Up ~$30B YoY; another year of sizable growth expected as infra ramps for AI.

tax_rate.context: Reflects new U.S. tax law with some uncertainty for FY rate.

regulatory.focus: DMA/LPA and European Commission engagement; additional EU restrictions could meaningfully impact revenue.
